recordingmedia: SD memory card, SDHC memory card, SDXC memory card

weightcipacompliant: Approx. 125g (Camera body only); Approx. 142g (Including battery & memory card)
interface: Unified digital input/output (Hi-Speed USB, Audio and Video output supported)
shootingmodes: Auto, P, Live View Control, SCN, Creative Filters, Movie
digitalzoom: Still Images/Movies: Approx. 4x (up to approx. 40x in combination with optical zoom)
